mapper.select: select schedule_id, schedule_date, ifnull(budget, 0) as 'budget', planner_id, schedule_type_id, schedule_content, latitude, longitude, schedule_order from schedule where planner_id = #{planner_id} and schedule_type_id = #{schedule_type_id} order by schedule_date, schedule_order

select schedule_id, schedule_date, ifnull(budget, 0) as 'budget', planner_id, schedule_type_id, schedule_content, latitude, longitude, schedule_order from schedule where planner_id = #{planner_id} order by schedule_date, schedule_order;
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(schedule_id, schedule_date, budget, planner_id, schedule_type_id, schedule_content, latitude, longitude, schedule_order) values (get_seq('schedule_seq'), #{schedule_date}, #{budget}, #{planner_id}, #{schedule_type_id}, #{schedule_content}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{schedule_order})
mapper.select: select schedule_order from schedule where planner_id = #{planner_id} and schedule_date = #{schedule_date} order by schedule_order desc limit 1
select * from schedule where planner_id = #{planner_id} order by schedule_id desc limit 1
mapper.update: update schedule S, (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as 'rnum', A.schedule_id as 'id' from schedule A, (select @rownum:=0) R where A.planner_id = #{planner_id} and A.schedule_date = #{schedule_date} and A.schedule_type_id=4) N set S.schedule_order = N.rnum where S.schedule_id = id
update schedule set schedule_order = #{schedule_order}, budget = #{budget} where schedule_id = #{schedule_id}
mapper.select: select schedule_date, schedule_type_id, schedule_content, latitude, longitude from schedule where schedule_type_id in (2, 4) and planner_id = #{planner_id} and schedule_date = #{schedule_date}
select schedule_type_id, schedule_content, latitude, longitude from schedule where schedule_type_id in (2, 4) and planner_id = #{planner_id}
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where planner_id = #{planner_id} and date(schedule_date) not between #{start_date} and #{end_date}
